name: rawst-berry
effect: Held in battle : When the holder is burned, it consumes this item to cure the burn. Used on a party Pokémon : Cures a burn.
short_effect: Held: Consumed when burned to cure a burn.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A hold item that heals a burn in battle.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that heals a burn in battle.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: When held by a POKéMON, it will be used in battle to heal a burn.
